error.msg: Array index 'arg_index' is used before limits check.
error.verbose: Defensive programming: The variable 'arg_index' is used as an array index before it is checked that is within limits. This can mean that the array might be accessed out of bounds. Reorder conditions such as '(a[i] && i < 10)' to '(i < 10 && a[i])'. That way the array will not be accessed if the index is out of limits.
